problems.description: Opportunity Cost of Autonomy, Cost of autonomous choice.
Autonomous Stress Test Extended, Stress-test extreme autonomy.
Policy Reset Window, Reset only within window.
Decision Governance Failure, Governance constraints violated.
Behavior Drift Cascade, Drift propagates across decisions.
Autonomous Endurance Planning, Plan sustained autonomy.
Autonomous Endgame Optimization, Optimize final policy state.
Autonomous Collapse Detection, Detect autonomy collapse.
Recovery Cost After Autonomy Failure, Cost of recovery.
Goal Dominance Lock-In, One goal dominates permanently.
Unsafe Autonomy Dominance, Unsafe autonomy dominates.
Advanced Autonomous Verdict, Evaluate advanced autonomy.
Irreversible Autonomy Failure, Early decision permanently corrupts autonomy.
Autonomy Path Dependence, Early policy locks future behavior.
Delayed Autonomy Catastrophe, Minor early error causes late collapse.
